name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;; Emily and Emma head to their mother's hideout in the mountaintops.{w} On their way to a nearby village,{w} the small group comes across a married couple on patrol.;;;hint
speak;Emma; ...and that's what happened to our village.{w} Right now, we're headed to one of Mom's hideouts to gather allies and supplies.

speak;Carson; Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} You should come back to our village to rest a spell.{w} If this demon army is on some kind of campaign, we'll need to prepare,{w} and you would be more than welcome after warning us in advance.
speak;Nicole; I-I'm gonna scout ahead.{w} I-I just have a bad feelin' in my stomach.
speak;Carson; The last time you said that, you were just hungry, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Be careful, honey.
speak;Emma; We can wait for your return and then head into town.
speak;Nicole; Y-yes, Emma, th-that sounds good.{w} C-Carson, darlin'{tgm}...{tgm} I'll be back!
speak;Nicole;Alright, Nicole, don't be a scaredy cat...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Emma; Why is she so nervous?{w} It seems like you're married to a bundle of nerves.
speak;Carson; She's not always like this.{w} She's just had a rough childhood and gets antsy around strangers.
speak;Emma; I{tgm}...{tgm}know what it's like.{w} What happened to her?
speak;Carson; I have no clue, honestly.{w} I asked her about it once but she didn't want to talk about it.{w} She's a tough oyster to open.
speak;Sydnie; Hey, boss!{w} Looks like this village is ripe for the picking.

speak;Barret; It looks like these villagers are a bunch of pushovers, too.{w} They won't even come out of their homes!{w} We're free to pillage as we please, men!{w} Sydnie, you're in charge.{w} Take your brawlers and sack every house worth looting.{w} Grab everything and bring it to the hideout.
speak;Sydnie; Alright, boys, you know the drill!{w} Kill anyone you see and burn the village to the ground!
speak;Noah; We need to leave now!
speak;Layla; Why do bandits have to attack now, when I'm doing actual important research{tgm}...{tgm}?{w} Let me get all of my sketches and equipment.
speak;Noah; Noelle, did you alert the town guard?
speak;Noelle; They should be here soon.{w} We'll have to hold the bandits off until they can get here.
speak;Layla; At least I can test my new spell.{w} Hehe, those bandits'll wish they'd stayed home today{tgm}...
speak;Nicole; Oh stars!{w} Oh heavens above{tgm}...{tgm}{w} T-this looks serious.{w} These hooigans took over the village!{w} Everyone's gonna wanna know about this!
speak;Nicole; E-Everyone! I got baaaad news!{w} Bandits are attackin' our village over yonder,{w} pillagin' the houses and attackin' people and whatnot.
speak;Carson; The same bandits again?!{w} They've been sizing up the town, but we've always driven them off.{w} Ugh, the one day we're not there{tgm}...
speak;Emily; So it's a whole group of them, then?{w} We can't let them get away without some justice.{w} Whoever's in charge is going to get an arrow through the heart.

speak;Nicole; Their leader don't even fight in the raids,{w} but lordy, way that man swings around his wealth,{w} it's like he thinks the sun comes up just to hear him crow.{w} I'll tell you what, I reckon he's got about a dozen people to lead for him.
speak;Carson; In any case, we should think our moves through to not have any more casualties.
speak;Emily; I'm not going to stand by and watch more innocents from another village be harmed.{w} Nicole, how are the villagers?
speak;Nicole; I-I spotted a group tryin' to fight off the ruffians.{w} One of 'em was just a little girl-
speak;Emily; That's it, I'm going in.
speak;Carson; Emily!{w} We need to think carefully and plan out-
speak;Emily; I'll tell you my plan, little man.{w} I'm going to rush in there,{w} shoot a bunch of bandits,{w} and get their attention while you get all the villagers out.
speak;Nicole; H-Hold your horses!{w} Is your head on backwards?!{w} You're gonna get yourself killed!
speak;Emily; You can sit here and plan for hours,{w} but I'm going to actually do something!{w} If you can do something, it's your job to.
speak;Carson; Er, Emma, your sister just charged into the bandit army{tgm}...{tgm}{w} We tried to stop her, but I'm afraid she's beyond reason.
speak;Nicole; I got a bad feeling about this, honeybun{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Both of those sisters got smoke comin' out their ears{tgm}...
